title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 24 cm [9.5"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 33 cm [13"]  Cut both sides.
b. Warp: 12.5 cm [5"] Cut top and bottom.

creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. gold color on gold color
b. pink ground with green and 2 other shades of pink
